info.description: OpenAPI service for managing Aliyun FC and Cloudflare R2.
info.title: OpenAPI Service

get.description: Get list of all Aliyun accounts

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get list of all Cloudflare accounts

post.description: Get information about a Cloudflare R2 bucket

delete.description: Delete a directory in Cloudflare R2 bucket

post.description: Copy a directory in Cloudflare R2 bucket
Get list of keys in a Cloudflare KV namespace

put.description: Update values for keys in a Cloudflare KV namespace

post.description: Get values for keys in a Cloudflare KV namespace

get.description: Get list of Cloudflare Pages projects
Get list of KV namespaces for a Cloudflare account
Get list of all Function Compute services

put.description: Update service alias to point to a specific version

post.description: Get list of aliases for a specific service
Get list of functions for a specific service
Get list of versions for a specific service

get.description: Validate token and get user information along with available zones
get.summary: Get zone information and validate token

200.description: Response with userid, username, environment, and country_code

get.description: Returns OK if the service is running

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
